__construct.name: __construct

get.name: get
get.summary: Returns the note with its url, start and end date of publication.

doc.description: Returns the note with its url, start and end date of publication.

get_all.name: get_all
get_all.summary: Returns all the notes of type 'pages'.

doc.description: Returns all the notes of type 'pages'.

get_by_url.name: get_by_url
get_by_url.summary: If the given url correspond to a published note returns the id.

doc.description: If the given url correspond to a published note returns the id.

delete.name: delete
delete.summary: Deletes the given note and unpublish it if published.

doc.description: Deletes the given note and unpublish it if published.

has_url.name: has_url
has_url.summary: Returns true if the note is linked to an url.

doc.description: Returns true if the note is linked to an url.

get_url.name: get_url
get_url.summary: Returns the url of the note.

doc.description: Returns the url of the note.

set_url.name: set_url
set_url.summary: Inserts the url for the note if it doesn't exist a published note with the same url or update the url of the given note.

doc.description: Inserts the url for the note if it doesn't exist a published note with the same url or update the url of the given note.

remove_url.name: remove_url
remove_url.summary: Removes the url corresponding to the given id_note from bbn_notes_url.

doc.description: Removes the url corresponding to the given id_note from bbn_notes_url.

get_event.name: get_event
get_event.summary: Returns the object event of the given note.

doc.description: Returns the object event of the given note.

update_event.name: update_event
update_event.summary: Updates the event relative to the given note.

doc.description: Updates the event relative to the given note.

get_start.name: get_start
get_start.summary: If it exists an event linked to the note it returns the start date.

doc.description: If it exists an event linked to the note it returns the start date.

get_end.name: get_end
get_end.summary: If it exists an event linked to the note it returns the end date.

doc.description: If it exists an event linked to the note it returns the end date.

set_event.name: set_event
set_event.summary: Inserts in bbn_events and bbn_notes_events the informations relative to the publication of the given note.

doc.description: Inserts in bbn_events and bbn_notes_events the informations relative to the publication of the given note.

get_full.name: get_full
get_full.summary: Returns all notes that has a link with bbn_events.

doc.description: Returns all notes that has a link with bbn_events.

get_full_published.name: get_full_published
get_full_published.summary: Returns an array containing all the published notes.

doc.description: Returns an array containing all the published notes.

is_published.name: is_published
is_published.summary: If the note has a corresponding event in bbn_events and the date of start is before now, and the date of end if isset is after now and the note has an url it returns true

doc.description: If the note has a corresponding event in bbn_events and the date of start is before now, and the date of end if isset is after now and the note has an url it returns true

publish.name: publish

doc.description: Publish a note.

unpublish.name: unpublish

doc.description: Unpublish a note.
